committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Forests, Family Farms, and Energy
Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to issue permanent easements for water conveyance systems in order to resolve title claims arising under Acts repealed by the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Amends the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to issue permanent easements, without reimbursement, for specified water systems in operation before October 21, 1976, which traverse National Forest System lands. Authorizes the Secretary to enter, repair, and assess costs against the holder of any right-of-way which has been allowed to deteriorate to the point of threatening persons or property, if the holder of the right-of-way refuses to perform the repairs.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to issue permanent easements for water conveyance systems in order to resolve title claims arising under Acts repealed by the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976, and for other purposes.
